item.title: Short-term vacancy
item.description: Job opening In our project entitled Species on the brink of extinction funded by the Hellenic Foundation for Research and Innovation (HFRI) and the General Secretariat for Research and Technology (GSRT) under grant agreement No 2418, we are offering one (1) short-term post-graduate position. Requirements If you are enthusiastic about working in the field, collecting plant samples and have (some) experience in and molecular/genetic techniques (especially in ISSRs), then you should probably consider to apply for this position.
